peripheral.title: DAC
peripheral.help_text:
A Digital-To-Analog converter is used to convert digital signals to
analog voltages which can interface with internal analog IPs or external world.

peripheral.title: DAC
peripheral.help_text:
The DAC module is a 12-bit, voltage output digital-to-analog converter. The DAC can
be configured in 8 or 12 bit mode and may be used in conjunction with the DMA controller. In
12-bit mode, the data could be left or right-aligned.
